results.content: The course was OK. It helped me to get my site up and running, which I appreciate. Sage has many useful tidbits throughout if you are willing to sit through some additional and often unnecessary commentary. The course would have been better if Sage used an outline versus just going through each item as we watched. Downside is that the course does not seem to be supported any longer. I asked a couple of follow-up questions in the forum that were never answered.
results.content_html: The course was OK. It helped me to get my site up and running, which I appreciate. Sage has many useful tidbits throughout if you are willing to sit through some additional and often unnecessary commentary. The course would have been better if Sage used an outline versus just going through each item as we watched. Downside is that the course does not seem to be supported any longer. I asked a couple of follow-up questions in the forum that were never answered.

results.content:
Thank you for this thorough and informative course! Sage's entertaining and laid back style makes what can be intimidating and daunting - setting up WordPress - more approachable. Especially if you have never done this before, or if you just question if you are doing it right, this coarse is perfect to make it all seem very easy. 
 I also appreciate that Sage added a section based on my request for more details on a particular plugin.  The walkthrough of the setup for Wordpress SEO Plugin by Yoast is an excellent addition.  Thank you!!
results.content_html:
Thank you for this thorough and informative course! Sage's entertaining and laid back style makes what can be intimidating and daunting - setting up WordPress - more approachable. Especially if you have never done this before, or if you just question if you are doing it right, this coarse is perfect to make it all seem very easy.
I also appreciate that Sage added a section based on my request for more details on a particular plugin. The walkthrough of the setup for Wordpress SEO Plugin by Yoast is an excellent addition. Thank you!!

results.content: How to do this course justice  with a short review when it is so rich in content and fun to watch?  You just have to try it for yourself.  I think we are just going to start a Sage Lewis fan club at my house.  If I watch them on the desktop, they get everyone's attention.  No, it's not the hat, I think it's the wonderful combination of professionalism and enthusiasm.  The hat is nice too, and the fact that the name Sage was on my short list of boys' names since my eldest baby dumpling was born, (christianmontoya on udemy, not a pitch to take the course!, 2009 dvd).  Oh, very important to mention, what really comes across to me from this course and  the additional  courses by Sage Lewis here on Udemy, is that he wants you to succeed.  That is probably why he has been asked to speak at so many places.  He points out the pitfalls and the choices that are least advantageous to your productivity, brand, etc.  I work in education so I  notice the degrees between good instructors and awesome teachers, and he falls into the latter.  Thank you for this course!
results.content_html: How to do this course justice with a short review when it is so rich in content and fun to watch? You just have to try it for yourself. I think we are just going to start a Sage Lewis fan club at my house. If I watch them on the desktop, they get everyone's attention. No, it's not the hat, I think it's the wonderful combination of professionalism and enthusiasm. The hat is nice too, and the fact that the name Sage was on my short list of boys' names since my eldest baby dumpling was born, (christianmontoya on udemy, not a pitch to take the course!, 2009 dvd). Oh, very important to mention, what really comes across to me from this course and the additional courses by Sage Lewis here on Udemy, is that he wants you to succeed. That is probably why he has been asked to speak at so many places. He points out the pitfalls and the choices that are least advantageous to your productivity, brand, etc. I work in education so I notice the degrees between good instructors and awesome teachers, and he falls into the latter. Thank you for this course!

results.content: At first, Word Press seems daunting (just as the instructor said), but if you give it a chance, and play around while you are watching, it has huge potential to build you a more robust site than the traditional web builder.  Thanks to the engaging instructor, I may just do this!
results.content_html: At first, Word Press seems daunting (just as the instructor said), but if you give it a chance, and play around while you are watching, it has huge potential to build you a more robust site than the traditional web builder. Thanks to the engaging instructor, I may just do this!

results.content: Video is more like a description of WordPress features and applications. Never went thru the process of building an website to see the featured and plugging fucntion and conf.

results.content: Aside from the presenters unprofessional delivery, he is often totally unprepared for each lecture. He stumbles over what he wants to say or simply reads the GoDaddy screens we could read ourselves, instead of delivering coherent, clear, and concise information. There is some good information in the course, but you will suffer through Sage's long winded and scattered delivery to find it. There are much better courses on Udemy that cover Wordpress basics. However, at present, this is the only course that covers GoDaddy. We can only hope that will change soon.

results.content: This course covers everything how to setup your own WordPress based website on GoDaddy.com (with or without domain hosting by them). Nothing is missed so that's good. I would only like better pacing with videos stripped of redundant information to give this course a 5.

Thank you for a very informative course for very little $!
